entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
